articles.name: neu-gigs-to-launch-nudoxx
articles.title: NEU Gigs to launch NUDoxx
articles.brief: Boston, MA - Are you tired of civil discussion? Are you a fan of Twitter mobs? Do you like cyberbullying? If the answer is yes to any of these questions, then I have great news for you.
articles.text:
Boston, MA - Are you tired of civil discussion? Are you a fan of Twitter mobs? Do you like cyberbullying? If the answer is yes to any of these questions, then I have great news for you. At a press conference attended by his parole officer, his mom, and a handful of paid influencers, NEU Gigs unveiled its latest service: NUDoxx, the latest in the lineup of barely functional NEU Gigs services. The program promises to be your all-in-one hub for doxxing, internet mobs, and bullying anyone who doesn’t strictly agree with your opinions.

“It’s truly revolutionary. Doxxing students with different opinions has never been easier” said one paid influencer, who asked to remain anonymous. According to the creator, some CS major who can't code anything more than “Hello World” and failed Fundies twice, the service only recently became an idea. The creator explained he made the program available on Instagram because he couldn't code his own app or figure out how to use squarespace. 

“I’ve been doxxing people for a long time so I thought, why not take it a step further?” Getting an angry brainless mob to harass someone who doesn't strictly share my views has always been a dream of the NEU Gigs creator. The press conference presented a demo showing a student asking a slightly difficult question then immediately being burnt at the stake after having all of his account details posted publicly. To conclude the press conference, the creator of NEU Gigs revealed that the service was already available to users who had similar opinions to his. After a short line of very obviously scripted questions the conference was dismissed.

In addition to this press conference, the Husky Husky has also booked an exclusive interview with the creator of NEU Gigs. Stay tuned, as we interview one of the most mediocre CS majors on campus before being doxxed ourselves.

articles.name: dining-tents-to-form-northeastern-clown-college
articles.title: Dining Tents to Form Northeastern Clown College
articles.brief: Northeastern has recently informed its students of its new dining protocols involving eating outside in tents, inspired by their research conducted on the residents of Ruggles.   While this is clearly an excellent way to add to the Northeastern dining experience of bad food by coupling it with a bad setting, some students have wondered what Northeastern plans to do with all these large tents and paved-over ruins that used to bring joy to our otherwise cripplingly dreary campus...
articles.text:
Boston, MA –  Northeastern has recently informed its students of its new dining protocols involving eating outside in tents, inspired by their research conducted on the residents of Ruggles. 

While this is clearly an excellent way to add to the Northeastern dining experience of bad food by coupling it with a bad setting, some students have wondered what Northeastern plans to do with all these large tents and paved-over ruins that used to bring joy to our otherwise cripplingly dreary campus. 

We took these questions to the administration and found out about a new plan currently slated for implementation in the spring semester: The School of Jesterial Arts. This is claimed to be totally unrelated to an immense donation by Alex Jones, who some have described as “The King of Clowns.”

When we asked Northeastern student Richard Fleck what he thought of these plans, his response was: “Well, I guess they are trying to attract kids from BU since we paved over their campus. Now they can attend a literal clown college instead of a figurative one!”

However, Northeastern claims that it was simply because they sunk millions into tents to the point that they’d rather create an entirely new college than cut their losses. In this brand-new college, students will be able to major in various fields such as sword-swallowing (unrelated to the NU Tinder scene), cannonball-catching, and the sexiest major of all: ventriloquism. 

When asked for comment, admissions officer Claire Henning said “It would be difficult finding people to study these extremely noble professions.”

To ensure the financial success of this venture, Northeastern has come up with an innovative way to deal with this. They plan to force students of various existing majors to transfer under threat of being forced to live and eat exclusively in Stwest.

To the complete surprise of the administration, these transfer students have serious gripes with the sudden change. 

Engineering major Akhil Gupta in particular has had a very traumatic reaction. We found him curled up in his bed crying, complaining that he’s “been having anxiety attacks since realizing he’ll never be able to pay off his student debt now.” When we mentioned that he’ll have to learn how to perform in front of other people, he simply broke down sobbing.

On the other hand, students in majors such as Philosophy, Theater, Art, History, and Art History are rejoicing, as their expected market value has risen as a result. It is true though that this will require more effort than they’ve ever expended before, as they will need to keep in shape, shed their trendy clothes, and prepare for a job other than as a Starbucks barista. We at the Husky Husky wish them luck on this endeavor come Spring.

All Husky Husky writers have voluntarily transferred to this new program as we are just clowning around writing and might as well have a major to match.
articles.author: 5ee693b7de0849334e41224e
articles.attr: Aoun announcing new plans for clown college in Spring.

articles.name: husky-husky-writer-doesnt-actually-write-anything
articles.title: Husky Husky Writer Doesn't Actually Write Anything
articles.brief: A private investigation into the Husky Husky has reported a writer who, despite having joined over a month ago, has yet to write anything.
articles.text:
Boston, MA - The Husky Husky requires a constant supply of fresh meat, primarily attracting new writers through Reddit and blackmail. This method leads to a very low retention rate, usually due to disappearances after writing strikes.

A private investigation into the Husky Husky has reported a writer who, despite having joined over a month ago, has yet to write anything. The average Husky Husky writer starts off with writing an article every 2 weeks, but is quickly whipped into shape as high-efficiency, low-quality, maximum-quantity content producers.

In a strange turn of events, one writer slipped under the radar. They won’t write an article. It has been weeks, and not even a draft. The so-called-writer, who shall remain anonymous, agreed to an interview to boast about how they have managed to not write an article for all this time despite being under AounLover69's brutal rule and stringent deadlines.

INTERVIEWER: So why did you join The Husky Husky?

“Writer”: Same old story, naive Northeastern student sees an article on Reddit, thinks it’s funny and wants to help write. They reach out to AounLover69 who proceeds to lure them in and then lock them under his control through blackmail and family kidnappings.

INTERVIEWER: *laughs* Yes, that pretty much sums it up. You’ve had a more successful writing career here than many who came and went. Despite tighter regulations and a stricter quota, you haven’t produced anything. Can you talk about how you’ve managed to stay ahead of the curve and continue your non-production?

“Writer”: Well, AounLover69 typically starts off by starving and whipping you (and not in the kinky way) with that stupid whip of his. He checks your production record and if he notices a drop in quantity, he whips ya. My method’s quite simple, really. Can’t check my production record if I never produce anything. Plus it’s hard to effectively punish a person when they get aroused by a whip. He’ll also threaten your family, which he has chained and locked away in his bunker somewhere. Little does he know, my family’s been dead to me for years. 

INTERVIEWER: So how have you managed to not write any articles?

“Writer”: I’m brainstorming. The creative process takes time, and genius can’t be rushed. Meanwhile, I contribute by occasionally editing some articles and shitposting in the discord. I promise there’s an article coming soon. Like, sometime within the next decade soon. Unless I figure out how to pick that dumb padlock on the door.

They declined to comment on how they’ve managed to survive without receiving the rations that are only issued to writers upon publication of an article. Given our working conditions, I suspect rats and rainwater. 

Upon sending a draft of this article to AounLover69 for editing, the aforementioned writer was swiftly apprehended by the secret police. Word amongst the writer barracks is that their eyes are being forced to focus on an empty Google Doc until they’ve completed an article. The Husky Husky does not tolerate slackers.
articles.author: 5f4679212796d045b71678f5
articles.attr: Image Courtesy of "Writer"

Fear no more! Northeastern is here to help transform your pain into an opportunity for success. articles.text:
On this glorious day, Northeastern is proud to present its teen pregnancy advocacy project: NUrture. Expecting mothers, this one's for you: 


Got a baby?

Got no resources?

Are you 16?

Fear no more! Northeastern is here to help transform your pain into an opportunity for success. Through this revolutionary feature, you will be able to set your child on the NUpath before they even take their first steps.


With NUrture, a handful of newborns babies will be chosen through a rigorous selection process inspired by our own co-op selection system and transferred to the luxurious confines of Aoun’s basement for specialized training. There, their fuzzy little brains will be carefully altered and shaped to conform to that of a perfect Northeastern student from day one. As the genius of our tactics is too extreme to explain, we will refrain from crowding your meager minds with the details.


All you need to know is that through careful research, we’ve developed just the right recipe of manure with which we can fertilize a perfect Northeastern student. We are thrilled to share this with the community, and hope that once we leave the testing stages and move onto mass production of this novel product we can end teen pregnancy once and for all. Give us your baby, and we will accept them to NU maybe.


******NOTE******

NUrture is NOT to be confused with NU(to)rture, a new interactive feature that we are looking forward to presenting to all of you in person at the start of the upcoming semester!

articles.name: administration-makes-switch-to-new-nasal-testing-protocol-outcome-snot-what-they-expected
articles.title: Administration Makes Switch to New Nasal Testing Protocol, Outcome 'Snot What They Expected
articles.brief: Polymerase Chain Reaction (PCR) testing, more commonly known as Pussies who Contract 'Rona testing, is a form of COVID testing in which the patient must insert a swab into his/her nasal cavity to retrieve a brain sample, not be confused with a booger. Second year ornithology major and PCR test veteran Hasber Dafetish describes the testing process best, "Dude, that shit is fuuuuucked...
articles.text:
Polymerase Chain Reaction (PCR) testing, more commonly known as Pussies who Contract 'Rona testing, is a form of COVID testing in which the patient must insert a swab into his/her nasal cavity to retrieve a brain sample, not be confused with a booger. 

Second year ornithology major and PCR test veteran Hasber Dafetish describes the testing process best, "Dude, that shit is fuuuuucked. Picture the feeling of a catheter, now move that shit to your nose... essentially your nose is a dick."

Initially, Northeastern contracted nurses to administer the PCR tests, nurses which President Auon pre-screened for “specific endowments”. However, when Administration later realized a number of said nurses were "providing services beyond those rooted in the practice of medicine", they suddenly "no longer felt the duties of their current medical practitioners were required" (further details were not disclosed by the university). Following the removal of these salacious, excuse me, sagacious nurses, there were reports of a sudden decline in student demand for testing.

With no professionals left to administer the PCR tests, the university turned to the students for help. Specifically, the school announced it was now the responsibility of the student, no longer the practitioner, to penetrate his/her own nasal passage or, in the words of Dafetish, dick nose. What Administration failed to recognize, much like a shitty frat wondering how to fill their ranks, was that business students exist.

The new swabbing protocol in place, it wasn’t long before PCR testing wait times were back up as D’Amore McKim students flocked to testing facilities to prove their superiority in deep nasal swab insertion. “You know what they say, deep nose, big dick”, respectfully explained a frat-bro that refused to identify as anything other than “for-the-bois” when prompted to explain this latest fad. While there were a number notable performances throughout the unofficial competition, it was second year investment major*, Brad Chadly’s, achieved insertion distance that blew away the field at a whopping 14.69 inches. Some say it may be years before we see another nose like his. When The Husky Husky asked for comment regarding the secret behind his sauce, he responded, “my Robinhood referral code is getD@Dough69, gang gang”, after which a frustrated mumble, “... Fuck, that was my password, not my code...”, was discerned as he walked away, blood and brain matter trailing behind his footsteps.

While many say deep nasal swabbing has given the student body a boogy in its step that it hasn’t seen since pre-quarantine, Administration recently found out about the inventive sport and enacted a total ban of nasal swabs on campus. Even though no such claims were made, the university denied “any such claims that the ultimate motivation for the ban was fear NUHCS will be revealed for its incompetence if any student gets hurt during the swabbing contest.” The university has yet to announce plans for COVID testing now that nasal swabs are not permitted within “the distance a CS student can comfortably stand next to the opposite sex” from campus. There are rumors, however, Administration will soon inform the student body of an anal test that will replace the prior nasal testing on campus. We at The Husky Husky will keep you updated as the situation continues to unfold.


* After further investigation by The Husky Husky staff, it appears that Chadley’s major is Self Declared. Officially, he is a PhD Undeclared major as recognized by the registrar

articles.name: op-ed-im-voting-for-joe-kennedy-because-hes-a-total-babe
articles.title: Op-Ed: I’m Voting for Joe Kennedy Because He’s a Total Babe
articles.brief: With the Massachusetts state primary on the horizon, constituents have raised numerous questions about Joe Kennedy’s campaign for Senate (“what the fuck?” and “why the fuck?” among others). Incumbent Senator Ed Markey has already garnered extensive progressive support, and the two candidates’ near identical platforms have left some scratching their heads. Despite all this, I believe there’s a strong case to be made for Joe Kennedy—namely, he’s an absolute chad.
articles.text:
Boston, MA – With the Massachusetts state primary on the horizon, constituents have raised numerous questions about Joe Kennedy’s campaign for Senate (“what the fuck?” and “why the fuck?” among others). Incumbent Senator Ed Markey has already garnered extensive progressive support, and the two candidates’ near identical platforms have left some scratching their heads. Despite all this, I believe there’s a strong case to be made for Joe Kennedy—namely, he’s an absolute chad. 

The Kennedy family is a political dynasty. They’re the closest thing to United States royalty, and, as evidenced by Queen Elizabeth herself, nothing is sexier than royalty. I, for one, would gladly overthrow democracy to instate a monarch, so long as they’re a smokin hot babe. On top of that, mathematicians have proven that, via the associative property, Joe Kennedy has been inside Marilyn Monroe, which means by the transitive property, anybody who does it with him has done it with Marilyn. He’s essentially having a threesome with Marilyn every time he fucks someone (please God let that be me someday). Ed Markey, like the beta he is, has fucked zero celebrities.

What else would I base my vote on? Policy? Track record? Gross. The biggest brain move is casting your ballot based on fuckability, which is exactly why I won’t be participating in the November election. GILFs just aren’t my thing (besides Her Majesty the Queen of course). You pissbabies can cry all you want about “harm reduction,” but you won’t change my mind. If I can’t rub one out to the presidential portrait then I’m not voting at all.

Our founding fathers wanted to form a more perfect union, and we can’t achieve perfection until we start electing more baddies. I refuse to legitimize a system that puts anyone less than a 7 in office. If you’re not playing smash or pass to decide who to vote for, you’re doing electoral politics all wrong. Go ahead and tell me it’s irrational to want my elected officials to be hotties, but I know I’m not the only one. There are only three relevant criteria when it comes to evaluating candidates: old money, clout, and an ass that don’t quit, and my man Rep. Kennedy passes with flying colors.

Anyways, I've got to go back to Heaven we're playing pool except the souls of the damned are the balls. John Fucking Kennedy out ****~~~~~ that's the flag you're welcome

articles.name: a-cs-majors-top-ten-tips-on-how-to-be-popular
articles.title: A CS Major’s Top Ten Tips on How to be Popular
articles.brief: When you arrive at the spectacular university that is Northeastern, most students seek to make bonds with their peers in order to increase their social circles. However, some students, especially computer science majors, don’t have the best luck with this process...
articles.text:
Boston, MA – When you arrive at the spectacular university that is Northeastern, most students seek to make bonds with their peers in order to increase their social circles. However, some students, especially computer science majors, don’t have the best luck with this process. 

Speculators think it is due to them being too busy with their work to waste time talking to others or that being around technology so much has desensitized them to actual human interaction. 

However, as an self-proclaimed expert of at least six programming languages, I have decided to provide my insight as a multi-linguist to my fellow computer science majors on how to become popular. 

In my extensive research on the many people around me, I have compiled a list of steps of how to probably become passably popular. Make sure to follow these steps to the letter and do exactly as I do, or you’ll end up as a friendless incel, just like all other computer scientists.

  1. Be Passionate
  2. Never Eat Alone
  3. Plan Group Activities
  4. Be Unique
  5. Connect With Others
  6. Be Confident
  7. Be Yourself

The first step is to be passionate about something. I always try to make it very obvious how enamored I am with programming, and will talk about it with anyone who will listen to me, which is mostly just the dining staff at Steast. 

Next, make sure to never eat alone, as it will cause you to lack interaction with other people, therefore degrading your social skills (obviously because just like computer parts if you use them too much they stop working). That’s why I always make sure to eat dinner with my parents, whose basement I live in off-campus. 

Obviously, you need to plan activities to do with your friends, otherwise you won’t have much to do with them. Personally, I host homework review sessions every week for my friends to come to, and even if no one shows up, it is enough just to make the effort, as your friends will still appreciate it even if the activity is boring and annoying. 

Now, it’s also important to differentiate yourself from others. Everyone is unique and you need to show why you are the best choice of friend, and this varies from person to person. In my case, I make sure to never shower in order to preserve a totally unique scent you can’t get from just anyone. I’ve even received compliments such as “I smelled you from across the room” and “You have to smell the most out of anyone I’ve ever met.” 

Connecting with others is also very important, and you can very simply do that by sliding into their DMs on LinkedIn. It’s actually harmful to connect with people on an individual basis in my experience, as they tend to avoid you if you try to hang out with them in person. 

Finally, make sure to be confident. This is an easy one for me, as I know I am the programming genius of the century. I ensure everyone knows how smart I am, especially my professors and academic advisors, who all seem to be jealous of me, causing them to get annoyed as a result. 

Overall, just make sure to be yourself, as you can’t be that bad, right? Right?!?


Editor’s Note: Husky Husky’s private investigators have since done some research into his day-to-day life and have discovered that unsurprisingly Gamer-Bot has no friends and only was seen communicating with his professors and TAs who are obligated to do so as part of their job. We tried to find a computer science major who has friends for a comment, but we simply couldn’t find any. If you know of one, please contact us after making an obligatory call to the endangered species hotline.
articles.author: 5ee693b7de0849334e41224e
articles.attr: Computer science major dreaming of being popular

articles.name: husky-husky-cancels-fall-co-ops-have-fun-at-school-fuckers
articles.title: Husky Husky Cancels Fall Co-Ops: "Have Fun at School, Fuckers"
articles.brief: Boston, MA - Dozens of Northeastern Co-op students awoke this Thursday to a stunning email in the inbox of their official Husky Husky™ accounts...
articles.text:
Boston, MA - Dozens of Northeastern Co-op students awoke this Thursday to a stunning email in the inbox of their official Husky Husky™ accounts. With no prior warning, The Husky Husky had unilaterally fired all of their Northeastern co-ops. 


“It was stunning,” said one complete fucking dunce, who requested to stay anonymous. “One day I was making mad HuskyBucks™, and the next I’m kicked out of the Husky- Husky Not a Cult Compound™ slumming it in goddamn Lightview. I’d jump out the window, but I’m pretty sure Lightview would use that as an excuse to extend my lease.” 


The Husky Husky, which previously had employed dozens of students for the Fall co-op cycle, now has nothing but empty desks and higher quality writing. Here at The Husky Husky, we managed to get an unprecedented interview with the President of The Husky Husky, Diogenes.


“Well, frankly, we just wanted to fire a bunch of interns. It’s so fun watching them pack up - we actually had them stream themselves putting their shit in a cardboard box on Zoom. They were already working in their apartments by that point - so they just moved their papers from one box to another. The editorial staff and I just ate popcorn and watched- it was fucking hilarious.” Said Diogenes, who was forced to pause multiple times in the interview due to uncontrollable laughter. “We hired all these liberal arts majors with 2.5 GPAs who couldn’t get a co-op anywhere - then fired their asses just as they got their apartments in Boston. We told them they needed to stay in Lightview for ‘security purposes’.”


When asked whether Coronavirus had any impact on their decision to fire all 25 co-ops, Diogenes was confused. “Corona.. what? What the hell is that? We just wanted to fire some students - I don’t even drink beer. I need .50 proof or higher ever since I started this goddamn job.” 


As for the laid-off student’s plans? Many are considering reapplying to the Husky Husky for the Spring semester. 


“It’s between this job and a job at Wayfair,” said another ex-co-op, who also requested to be anonymous. “At least with The Husky Husky, I have a little more job security.” 


Mandatory Disclosure: The Husky Husky™  is owned by The Husky Husky™, which has close ties to The Husky Husky™. However, we at The Husky Husky™ have a commitment to journalistic integrity and promise The Husky Husky™ will stay neutral in our reporting of The Husky Husky™ despite our involvement with The Husky Husky™ and their subsequent involvement with The Husky Husky™.
articles.author: 5ea89a82b7e61d16ce967c1a
articles.attr: Pictured: A Husky Husky leaves the Husky Husky Not a Cult Compound after getting canned for being useless.

articles.name: husky-husky-travel-tips
articles.title: Husky Husky Travel Tips
articles.brief: In these trying times (or a great fuckin time to reopen as the Northeastern administration calls it) us huskies faced great peril. We’ve lost Rebecca’s, Chicken Lou’s, and more importantly the ability to bang anyone from another dorm...
articles.text:
In these trying times (or a great fuckin time to reopen as the Northeastern administration calls it) us huskies faced great peril. We’ve lost Rebecca’s, Chicken Lou’s, and more importantly the ability to bang anyone from another dorm. Nevertheless, we’ve bounced back and more importantly some of us have decided to come back to campus. So for those brave huskies who have decided to take back the holy land, we have prepared a list of travel tips to make your life a little less miserable.

Wear BU merch to stay safe

Now hold on, I know what you are thinking. Why on earth would I ever wear merch from that garbage strip mall? The answer is simple. If you wear Northeastern merch everyone will see how awesome and smart you are. Those people will want pictures, autographs, and handshakes. None of this is great for social distancing. But if you wear BU merch, no one will want to associate with you. Ever. People won’t come close to you and will move away when they see you coming

Bonus tip: Wear BUSINESS SCHOOL merch so everyone will think you’re a massive douchebag coming back from their Goldman Sachs co-op. Those people will be sure to stay out of your way.

Load up on Husky Dollars™

Husky Dollars are a traveler’s most essential tool. With the rise of popularity in Husky Dollars, it is essential to carry at least 20,000 Husky Dollars for any emergencies. Most locations will happily accept this method of payment. After all, analysts predict that the value of our university currency will overtake the US Dollar within the next 3 ISEC buildings.

Carry some reading material

Due to social distancing and other safety precautions, hooking up with other passengers and joining the mile high club is a no-go. Instead carry some light reading material to keep yourself entertained. We recommend President Aoun’s book “How I Did It: The Story of Tricking Northeastern Students Into Thinking We Know What We Are Doing” as it provides useful information about the potential hellscape Northeastern can become. That is, if enough idiots congregate at the crack house that is PIKE. Aoun even wrote this book himself (like 2 sentences and the title but that’s pretty much it) without any help at all.

Wear a Mask

This may apparently be controversial to some, especially those who think watching Grey’s anatomy counts as going to med school. Nevertheless, wearing a mask is a must. If not for safety but for style, as there are plenty of ways to get creative. Put a political statement on your mask to let everyone know how much you care or lease out the space and put up some ads. You can even put a picture of our lord and savior Aoun.

Just stay home

Traveling nowadays is too much of a hassle. TSA will molest you because you have a drop of water in your thermos and some angry white guy will yell at you about freedom for wearing a mask. It is easier to stay home, bust out the good old VR headset and log into N.U.online.

That’s all for our travel tips. I’m sure Aoun can’t wait to see a  Stay safe as you journey back to our holy land (especially if you’re going through New Jersey).
articles.author: 5ea89c67b7e61d16ce967c21
articles.attr: PAWS Following some HHTT

articles.name: an-exclusive-interview-with-neu-gigs
articles.title: An Exclusive Interview With NEU Gigs
articles.brief: Boston, MA - My fellow Chirpy Chunky Happy Healthy Huskies this is Dan, the Husky Husky tech correspondent. I recently took a small break from writing (and no one noticed) but I had to come back to report on the latest tech out of Northeastern...
articles.text:
Boston, MA - My fellow Chirpy Chunky Happy Healthy Huskies this is Dan, the Husky Husky tech correspondent. I recently took a small break from writing (and no one noticed) but I had to come back to report on the latest tech out of Northeastern. Recently, NEU Gigs has launched a new Mob Justice Service by the name of NUDoxx. I got the chance to chat with the creator of this new program courtesy of the following exclusive Husky Husky interview.


Dan - I don’t know if I should say good morning or good afternoon. It’s 2pm but you are still wearing those silly orange pajamas.


NEUgigs - This is actually a bodysuit from the OSCCR Correctional Facility. I’ve just gotten out of there, I got arrested for doxxing Aoun over a tweet.


Dan - Yikes, anyway let’s start with my first question. How did the idea for NUDoxx come to fruition?


NEUgigs - You see I run this page, this wonderful and amazing page, it’s huge, the hugest one in Northeastern ever and it’s called NEU Gigs. I started it because my girlfriend from BU dumped me for some guy that rows crew at Harvard. But anyway, I was sitting in Curry managing my huge page and I got a weird request. Some guy wanted me to doxx someone because they had said that they didn’t like Avatar. I was furious, really furious so I used that page to doxx the guy, I leaked his OnlyFans, his Twitter, his LinkedIn, I leaked everything. I got such a hard on that I couldn’t even move, so I decided this was what I wanted to do.


Dan - Awesome, people really like the prospect of internet mobs. I want to know more about NUDoxx. How does the service work? 


NEUgigs - Well, it’s a patented process so if you try to copy it my dad is going to sue you ok? I’m serious I even have the paperwork and all.


Dan - I swear I would never try to copy it.


NEUgigs - Good, even if you tried it is such a high IQ idea that some normie like you would not get it. The service is awesome and it works, it really works. I just go through my DMs and if I see someone I don’t like, I screenshot it and then I post it. Then I put a really good caption, and I say they are racist using my alt account. The mob then shows up and does the job. It’s beautiful, one time this guy said that he didn’t order the same thing as me in Rebecca’s (A JFK with triple ketchup that he allegedly calls “the Dallas special”) and I doxxed him. I called him a sandwich supremacist and let the mob have him. They burnt him at stake and attacked his family.


Dan - That does sound a little intense. However, all this talk about posting has raised the question as to why you don’t have your own platform. Does this have to do with the rumors that you never actually passed Fundies and that you’re too scared to use Squarespace?


NEUgigs - Ah those rumors, they’re nothing but fake news. I am the best coder that I know and I can code. I code a lot, all the time. I know the languages, all of the programming languages that exist. I can even speak P++ and Cython fluently. My skill is beyond what most people can ever comprehend. I just haven’t coded my own platform because I am a very busy person. So busy, I’m always doxxing people or in very important meetings. You know I would show you my transcript but you would cry.


Dan - Sounds very impressive if you ask me. One last question because your parents told me they have to use the basement soon. What’s next for your NEU Gigs venture and what additions do you plan on implementing to NUDoxx?


NEUgigs - I have something big, very big, in store for next year. I’ll give you a sneak peak because I’m that generous and awesome. A lot of people are going to come back and all of those people, they have someone they don’t like. A lot of people that have different opinions, we can’t have that. So I’m gonna expand a lot more, I plan on twitter cancellations, getting people fired from co-op. Stuff no one in their right mind would try. But I’m an innovator and I’m a CS major, the best CS major on campus. I’m gonna do it, and if it doesn’t work I’ll call everyone who disagrees with me a racist, fascist, poo face.

articles.name: op-ed-neu-gigs-wont-promote-my-onlyfans-its-time-to-boycott
articles.title: Op-Ed: NEU Gigs Won’t Promote My OnlyFans, It’s Time to Boycott
articles.brief: In recent months, as the notorious Instagram account NEU Gigs began gradually transforming into something of an NEU Wild Confessions 2.0, I’ve found myself questioning whether the incessant spam on my feed was worth tolerating. Nevertheless, I persisted, holding out in the hopes that maybe, just maybe I might need it one day. Unfortunately, a recent experience with the manager of the account, Mr. Gigs himself, put me at my breaking point.
articles.text:
Boston, MA – In recent months, as the notorious Instagram account NEU Gigs began gradually transforming into something of an NEU Wild Confessions 2.0, I’ve found myself questioning whether the incessant spam on my feed was worth tolerating. Nevertheless, I persisted, holding out in the hopes that maybe, just maybe I might need it one day.

Unfortunately, a recent experience with the manager of the account, Mr. Gigs himself, put me at my breaking point. Upon DMing him a simple, reasonable request—to promote my OnlyFans account—I was met with nothing but a blatantly disrespectful “lmaooooo [cry laughing emoji]” in response. 

Am I a joke to you? What about my profession is a laughing matter? When I sent another message to request that he please promote my online bath water shop as well, I received even more disdain. He told me that promoting the monetization of my simp magnetism felt “unprofessional,” didn’t “fit with the NEU Gigs brand,” and was “an insult to hardworking business majors” like himself. 

First of all, Mr. Gigs, we all know that’s an oxymoron. There is no hard work in business school, only hustle, and baby, I’m a hustler. I can’t help that I’m a hottie with a body. The horny mob has a demand and I’m supplying it; don’t come at me for being an entrepreneurial spirit with a rack to match. I’m merely giving the simps what they want and chasing a bag at the same time, is that so wrong? This is what the gig economy should be all about.

Second of all, I refuse to silently accept this mockery. I’ve decided to boycott NEU Gigs, and I encourage everyone to do the same. If we’re being honest here, what is there to miss—students selling overpriced textbooks that are available for free on Library Genesis? Last minute attempts to sublet $5000 studio apartments? 24 hour exhibitions of sexual harassment from creepy Tinder men? I know, it’s daunting to think that you might miss out on one of those extremely effective change.org petitions asking the university to lower tuition, but in the name of sexual liberation, we must. It’s time to take a stand against the insidious manifestations of patriarchy and click that unfollow button.

Ladies and simps, let us follow in the footsteps of brave feminist icons like Susan B. Anthony, Margaret Sanger, and Belle Delphine. This is the second wave of the sexual revolution; you’re either with it, or against it. To all the real ones who want to support my work, you can buy my artisanal bath water at shop.aounurine.com, or subscribe to my OnlyFans @AounLover69, where I post a variety of content, from foot pics, to semi-SFW anime girl cosplay, to [censored by The Husky Husky editorial staff].

articles.name: snitches-get-bitches-northeastern-announces-new-snitching-incentive-nusex
articles.title: Snitches Get Bitches : Northeastern Announces New Snitching Incentive NUSex
articles.brief: NUSex provides students with opportunities to build their Northeastern network in the most intimate way possible
articles.text:
While stern letters and dismissals to members of the freshman class have already accomplished so much, Northeastern University has decided to add an additional layer of insurance to guard against parties. 


The Husky Husky sat down with the woman who spearheaded the initiative. Rico Whack first provided clarification on the new policy, saying “Bitches is a gender neutral term which encompasses any person.” Her assistant then quickly interjected, adding “Of course excluding N.U.in students.”  


Whack continued, explaining “NUSex provides students with opportunities to build their Northeastern network in the most intimate way possible. Students who report parties occurring on or off campus will be paired up with other snitching students and given yoga mats in tents. We do not anticipate the students needing more than 6-8 minutes to reach completion, so turnover will be quick.”


There will be a hotline which is expected to gain notoriety through various colorful infographics that will circulate via SGA members’ Instagram stories. Additionally, a pre-recorded town hall will be posted to the newly created Husky OnlyFans account. 


Tents will be sanitized by CAMD interns, who are encouraged to exercise creativity in their use of limited cleaning supplies. Space for these tents was created through the newly paved over Boston University campus.


NUSex appears to be only the beginning in a series of expansive new incentives. Whack teased one called NUChecks, where “Snitches Get Riches.” The value of these riches was described to be “experiential” rather than “monetary.”

articles.name: innovative-professor-uses-anime-avatars-for-online-lectures
articles.title: Innovative Professor Uses Anime Avatars for Online Lectures
articles.brief: Instead of relying on antiquated realistic video lectures, this innovative professor will now match the flat delivery of their online lectures with two-dimensional, full-body anime avatars.
articles.text:
Boston, MA – Many university students already struggle to focus during lectures, and the recent hybrid NUflex plans will make focusing even harder. The quarantine destroying our last few brain cells won’t help either. Northeastern faculty Professor Hoover has figured out how to get students to stop recording Tik Toks and listen to lectures instead. Instead of relying on antiquated realistic video lectures, this innovative professor will now match the flat delivery of their online lectures with two-dimensional, full-body anime avatars.

When asked what they thought of their colleague’s actions, a boomer professor said: “These avatars don’t look anything like us! This will confuse our students to a level even our lectures can’t achieve!”

We decided to discuss this new pedagogy with Northeastern Anime Club President: Garth W. Eeb.

Gamer-Bot: “Garth, what do you think of this professor’s new plan?”

Garth: “It’s ingenious! It will ensure that all of us weebs–I mean, normal students–will be enraptured with the lecture being given to us! Especially with the level of detail on these avatars.”

Gamer-Bot: “What specifically about the level of detail is so important?”

Garth: “Simply put, physics. Everything has to be realistic to be engaging, and the best way to be realistic is with physics. Not boring, real-world physics either. No, we need skirts flying up unreasonably high and men’s shirts spontaneously sliding off and exposing their flawless physiques!”

Gamer-Bot: “NANI THE FUCK!?!”

Garth: “You clearly don’t get it, you hater of Japanese culture. At least professor Hoover understands us.”


We decided to go meet with professor Hoover and ask for his input. 

Prof Hoover - “I really love using this new unorthodox technology! Although it may seem redundant, I love to rewatch my lectures. I find them to be even more fascinating when an anime avatar replaces me! Because.. you know, I’m only watching to reinforce the material… really just for that...”

When asked why he was using various avatars, including one described as an “anime schoolgirl with clothing 3 sizes too small (who is actually a 10,000 year old demon lord),” he simply said we were lacking the SAIL-approved “global mindset” needed to understand the appeal. Apparently, neither were the NUPD officers that showed up shortly after we alerted them.

articles.name: op-ed-the-westin-11-make-northeastern-look-like-the-dumbest-school-in-boston
articles.title: Op-ed: The Westin 11 Make Northeastern Look Like the Dumbest School in Boston
articles.brief: Boston, MA — In a turn of events that can only be described as entirely predictable, 11 NU.in. students were caught hosting an intimate get together, promptly suspended, and refused refunds. We beat out some of COVID-19’s favorite campuses on twitter and caused quite the uproar (UNC who?). I’ve always had the mindset that no publicity is bad publicity, but having the world know that we had eleven (11!) entire students that were stupid enough get caught breaking the rules is embarrassing...
articles.text:
Boston, MA — In a turn of events that can only be described as entirely predictable, 11 NU.in. students were caught hosting an intimate get together, promptly suspended, and refused refunds. We beat out some of COVID-19’s favorite campuses on twitter and caused quite the uproar (UNC who?). I’ve always had the mindset that no publicity is bad publicity, but having the world know that we had eleven (11!) entire students that were stupid enough get caught breaking the rules is embarrassing.

To be honest, getting caught at such a small gathering is a waste of your time and money. If you’re gonna party, go all out. Rent a bounce house, do some body shots, hook up with your MILF neighbor, and rub it in Northeastern’s face that you’re too fucking chad to get caught. 

While NU.in. students are widely known to be incompetent, this incident has exposed Northeastern for admitting beta cucks too weak to stare the virus in the face. If they had dealt with the RA the old fashioned way (aka a quick punch to the throat) we wouldn’t even be in this situation.  

Personally, I arrived on campus a week ago, and have been on a bender ever since. If I don’t have coronavirus by the time classes start I will be shocked and upset. The amount of time I spend getting railed will only rival my time spent on the respirator. If you aren’t practicing having shortness of breath via choking and/or deep throating then you’re a weak link. Natural selection should take you out. 

Do yourself a favor. Get better at breaking the rules. If we all have coronavirus, none of us have coronavirus. #GoCorona2020.

No shots at NEU, a great school, but people go into the NU.in program not for the international experience; they go for the coop experience they get later on. Also one of my friends go into BU and Nu.in and was thinking about going there, but got off Emory's waitlist and goes there instead. (P.S. don't make an argument that NEU is better than Emory, cuz its not) Nu.in is more about gaming the system than making other students happy they got in.

articles.name: move-over-bama-northeastern-announced-as-the-1-party-school-in-the-nation
articles.title: Move Over ‘Bama — Northeastern Announced as the #1 Party School in the Nation
articles.brief: Boston, MA — In a shocking turn of events, 11 students at Northeastern were recently apprehended for hosting an “unsafe” gathering. Many people are arguing over the ethics of the students’ punishments, but I urge everyone to look at this issue from a different angle...
articles.text:
Boston, MA — In a shocking turn of events, 11 students at Northeastern were recently apprehended for hosting an “unsafe” gathering. Many people are arguing over the ethics of the students’ punishments, but I urge everyone to look at this issue from a different angle. 

This is the first naturally documented case of a party at Northeastern. A school that was previously known as asocial and filled with anti-chads who care more about experiential learning than their sex lives. 

A gathering of 11 people may not seem like a lot, but I truly believe that this was one small step for man, one giant step for Howlin’ Huskies. The potential and growth seen in these actions is what has inspired US News to officially name Northeastern as the #1 party school in the nation. There are no bounds to what could happen at our next party, people may even find the balls to drink. 

The Husky Husky will report on the latest rankings as they develop. Don’t go too hard too fast, you crazy kids. #PartyOnPack.

articles.name: students-flee-in-terror-as-husky-surprise-drones-hunt-social-distancing-violators
articles.title: Students Flee in Terror as Husky Surprise Drones Hunt Social Distancing Violators
articles.brief: It was not until the drones amassed in the shape of daddy Aoun’s face, and a booming voice emanating from the drones bellowed “Stay six feet away,” did students realize daddy Aoun had led them into a trap.
articles.text:
Boston - On Tuesday night, students gathered en masse in Columbus parking garage, blatantly disregarding social distancing to get a good view of what promised to be a wild conclusion to Convocation. When the drones blinking on the fields failed to rise at the 9 p.m start time (despite over thirty fucking minutes of trouble shooting prior), students should have realized something was amiss. 

But it was not until the drones amassed in the shape of daddy Aoun’s face, and a booming voice emanating from the drones bellowed “Stay six feet away,” did students realize daddy Aoun had led them into a trap. 

As students, mainly freshmen, ran towards the staircase, the drones converged on the garage, knocking students unconscious by dropping copies of Aoun’s upcoming book We Will Remain on their heads. While some were able to escape through the stairwell, they quickly became jammed. Those attempting to use the elevator were let down by the untimely breakdown of Northeastern’s otherwise speedy elevator service.

Our Husky reporter caught up with one freshman, before he was felled by Aoun’s drones. “I just don’t understand!” he cried breathlessly as a drone, splitting from the pack, locked onto him. “How could he do such a-”

Here at the Husky Husky, the safety of our reporters is marginally important. Only our editors have the right to harm perform negative reinforcement on our writers. As such, our reporter was simply following protocol when she tripped David, first year mechanical engineering major, to avoid being captured. Our duty is to the paper, not the student body.

As our reporter hurried into the conveniently placed Husky Husky getaway helicopter, she observed the drones carrying the fallen bodies through the night sky, presumably towards Wellness Housing.

articles.name: leaked-excerpts-from-aouns-tell-all-book
articles.title: Leaked Excerpts from Aoun’s Tell-All Book
articles.brief: After the enormous success of his first book, Robot-Proof, President Aoun has decided to follow up with what is sure to become a new bestseller.
articles.text:
Boston, MA – After the enormous success of his first book, Robot-Proof, President Aoun has decided to follow up with what is sure to become a new bestseller—We Will Remain: A University, a Global Crisis, and the Lessons of Leadership. In this new book, expected to be released in October, Aoun gives a dramatic account of Northeastern’s decisions at the highest levels of leadership and imparts lessons applicable to any business or leader. 

The Husky Husky has managed to get its paws on some exciting excerpts from this upcoming book. 

Don’t Be First

Whenever you face a difficult decision, you might get a strong urge to be a leader. To be bold. To be different.

Ignore that urge.

Instead, just let Harvard go first. Once they do something, you can do it too, and you’ll look smart. And if it blows up in your face, no one will blame you, because even Harvard made the same mistake!

That’s what we did when the pandemic started. In February, we created a COVID-19 task force of experts and diverse stakeholders to hit the refresh button on the Harvard website 231 times per minute until Harvard made a decision for us. 

So find your Harvard. Find the strongest company in your field, the smartest person in the classroom, or the most prestigious peer institution and just latch onto them. 

Buzzwords

Everyone loves a good buzzword. That’s why we formed one as soon as possible. It doesn’t even need to make sense. We actually just used a random word generator for ours. It spit out “single pane of glass.” Whenever people asked a question we couldn’t answer, we just referred them back to that sexy little phrase, and they felt too confused to ask any more questions. 

If you get stuck trying to come up with a phrase, here are some options from the random word generator that might be helpful:

  • Interdisciplinary experiential data-driven
  • Unprecedented global mindset
  • Cultural agility diversity
  • Happy healthy howlin’ huskies

Dominatrix

Getting subordinates in line is a must-do. That’s why I administered this “What % Dominant and Submissive Are You During Sex” to all members of my senior leadership team to determine the most dominant member of my cabinet. Turns out Madeleine Estabrook is quite the dominatrix, and she whipped students into line very quickly. 

Reflecting on Results

Amid a global pandemic, we triumphed. [Insert number of sick students who paid NU tuition] students were sent to the hospital. Meanwhile, BU, BC, and Harvard sent [insert number of sick students from inferior schools] students to the hospital, so we won the Beanpot of disease.

[Insert fake news outlet] has criticized our policy for [minor nuisance], but it was worth it because [money, but make it sound not like money]. All leaders should learn from Lord Farquaad in Shrek: “Some of you may die, but that is a sacrifice I am willing to make.” 

But leaders must also take time to mourn when regrettable losses do befall those in our care. Despite all my success against the virus, there was one casualty I couldn’t prevent: the loss of Rebecca’s. It keeps me up at night, knowing I was in charge of her delicious sandwiches and couldn’t keep her safe when it mattered most. This will forever haunt me as my first and only failure.

No Such Thing as Bad Publicity

Make sure to milk your success (or lack thereof) for all it’s worth. Before you get your results, write a book about your success. Then try this life hack: leak the book beforehand! People will be very confused how you can write a book about your success before official results are in. A minor scandal will ensue. This is good. Now your book is getting free publicity!

articles.name: how-to-get-a-co-op-at-your-fathers-company
articles.title: How to Get a Co-op at Your Father’s Company: Comments From a Business Major Who Defied All Odds
articles.brief: Boston, MA (Editorial) - I find it so pathetic listening to people complain about not getting a co-op. These people with their high GPAs and voluptuous extracurriculars don’t have the balls to get even the most basic position. For that reason, I have taken it upon myself to outline actionable steps to getting a good co-op.
articles.text:
Boston, MA (Editorial) - I find it so pathetic listening to people complain about not getting a co-op. These people with their high GPAs and voluptuous extracurriculars don’t have the balls to get even the most basic position. For that reason, I have taken it upon myself to outline actionable steps to getting a good co-op.

Compared to other pathetic life bloods looking for Business co-ops, my resume is hardly impressive. Yes, I’m a business major, but these steps can apply to other majors. I graduated high school with a well earned 2.2 GPA, 1040 SAT, and 3.5 hours of community service, punishment for accumulating 4 sexual assault charges. To be clear, I was only sober for one of those.

Northeastern seemed like an obvious choice of schools: overtly bureaucratic policies, acceptance rate manipulation, and low diversity. Even better, I didn’t have to write an essay after my father donated ISEC 3 through 5.

Once you’re in, the co-op and resulting full-time job are handouts. It’s Northeastern for fuck’s sake. Home of experiential learning and free jobs.

Here’s how I got mine. For the weak minded and CAMD students out there, I am going to break this down into three sections: the resume, the interview, and co-op selection.

The resume is going to be, by far, the hardest part. The key here is to highlight the important qualities and skills you have. For example, your best quality is your last name. Wherever possible, make sure a recruiter will know your father runs this company. His name is on the masthead and therefore your name is on the masthead. Follow that up with quantitative measures of performance. I.e. Big numbers. This could include the number of beers you can hold, your father's company phone number or the revenue your father has brought in. You get it. Give them no choice but to accept you.

After submitting your resume, the interview should be a walk in the park. If you ever lose confidence in your ability to perform, just don’t forget it’s your father’s company. The key here is to make eye contact, give a firm handshake, and make sure the interviewer has your coffee order right. If not, it probably isn’t worth keeping him on payroll. Remember, you’re interviewing to be his boss.

Co-op selection will obviously be easy. The trick here is not to settle too early on. You’re not going to settle for any bullshit “Junior Vice President” roles. “Junior” is equivalent to Dunkin Coffee. YOU ONLY DRINK TATTE. Beyond that, You want a maximum commitment of 15 hours per week for 6 months. Don’t let that go above 20 hours. Your time is valuable. They will work for you some day.

Now that the morning shift has finished, I’m off to my 3 hour lunch break. Don’t embarrass your father; Just get the co-op.
articles.author: 5f28be06d19e260835fecb9b
articles.attr: Actual Business Major Pictured

articles.name: frisky-husky-husky-husky-launches-new-rebeccas-flavored-condoms
articles.title: Frisky Husky Husky Husky launches new Rebecca's-Flavored Condoms
articles.brief: The latest product line released by FHHH® aims to bring solace to a grieving student body.
articles.text:
Boston, MA - A somber mood hangs in the air, palpable within the city. The late-summer sky shines, bright and cloudless, as a celebration of what it was, what it meant to all of us. I am referring, of course, to the loss of Rebecca’s Cafe at Churchill Hall. Since that fated day it closed for good, the Northeastern community has been working hard to accept the reality that their beloved cafe is no more. 

No more Nicoles. No more California Turkey Clubs. No more Buffalo Chicken Wraps. No more BBQ Chicken and Bacons. It fills me with rage and indescribable sadness when I see the flags across Boston remain at full mast. Show some damned respect. 

However, Northeastern Students have nothing to fear, as Rebecca’s will have the lasting legacy it deserves. After hosting a funeral for the moldy Niall they found in the back of the fridge, the Frisky Husky Husky Husky® team has been hard at work developing their latest product line and is excited to announce the Frisky Husky Husky Husky Roarin’ Rebecca’s-Infused-Penetration Remembrance Tasty Sex Package©.

With these new cock socks, relive the taste of sandwiches you haven’t had since March. Enjoy a Rebecca’s BLT while you slobber on a woody-hoody. Indulge in the flavor of chicken tendies from a splooge-poncho. The JFK wrapper dapper guarantees that you won’t splash your partner like he did. 

After hearing this venture pitch, IDEA announced it was the best pitch they’ve ever heard. With their help, FHHHRRIPRTSP features the slogan, “Sex, with the loving embrace of a Rebecca’s sandwich. It’ll make you forget the name of the girl you’re piping. The only girl that mattered was Rebecca.” Aoun has invested $69 million dollars to triple production.

Initial reviews from product testers were extremely positive. 

“I get to relive my most treasured memories, my boyfriend gets a knob slob. It’s a win-win.”

“Sometimes I just take a Niall flavored condom and wrap it around a subway footlong. What happens next is between me and Jesus.”

“I wish I had fewer ribs.”

The FHHHRRIPRTSP is scheduled to launch next week, just in time for the freshmen who abandon social distancing for bumping booties to educate themselves on what they missed out on.

articles.name: greek-life-takes-over-nupd-advisory-board
articles.title: Greek Life Takes Over NUPD Advisory Board
articles.brief: The frat bois and their sorority sisters have held a press conference to detail their plans for progress. While there were many loud belches and hiccups we have since edited out, here is what we could decipher from their drunken ramblings...
articles.text:
Boston, MA – Recently the Northeastern administration has created an advisory board for our very own NUPD. In the months since its creation, this board has talked to students, NUPD officers, and the community. However, they decided it would be best to listen to the group that has, by far, the most interaction with NUPD: Greek Life. To create the swiftest change possible, they have relinquished complete control of NUPD to the Interfraternity Council and the Panhellenic Council.

The frat bois and their sorority sisters have held a press conference to detail their plans for progress. While there were many loud belches and hiccups we have since edited out, here is what we could decipher from their drunken ramblings.

Chad – “Yo! I’m Chad Johnston here representing kappa delta pi theta gamma or whatever the fuck our name is. Greek is hard. Anyway, we have a few changes we are making to the NUPD to help our school stay chill.”

Becky – “Well, like, obviously we are stopping all drug-related investigations. We totally can’t have NUPD stopping our rocking parties during Corona or we won’t be able to chillax after a super cute day of binge-drinking.”

Chad – “That’s exactly right Becky. It’s essentially a hate crime to stop us from getting black-out drunk in a cramped room. I almost got accepted to a decent law school so you have to listen to me on this one.”

Becky – “NUPD is also known to have escort services to get hammered students back to campus safely. That’s a fucking disgrace. The walk of shame for the geeks ugly enough to be unable to find someone to hook up with for the night is necessary and if it puts them in danger so be it.”

Chad – “Instead, we are now requiring NUPD to only escort unlabeled containers of vodka – I mean, water, directly to our parties where we are totally distancing. They are not allowed to tamper with the bottles because they might dilute our righteous booze with their weak ‘Rona.”

Becky – “Finally, we noticed that some of you beta-cucks haven’t been attending our first few parties. What the fuck is up with that? You come to college to learn or something?!? Fucking prudes. Probably can’t even down a gallon of beer in under a minute.”

There was a planned Q&A section but upon us asking how they could reasonably expect NUPD to go along with this they sicced their drunken mob of students and NUPD on us, and we had to flee before it was too late.
articles.author: 5ee693b7de0849334e41224e

articles.name: northeastern-defeats-coronavirus-only-to-get-blindsided-by-measles
articles.title: Northeastern Defeats Coronavirus Only to Get Blindsided by Measles
articles.brief: In a surprising turn of events, campus will be closing for the rest of the semester due to an unexpected measles epidemic.
articles.text:
Against all odds, Northeastern’s robust reopening plan managed to prevent a COVID-19 outbreak on campus. But in a surprising turn of events, campus will be closing for the rest of the semester due to an unexpected measles epidemic.

Social distancing guidelines proved effective against the coronavirus, but they could not stop a rare strain of the measles. Fortunately, this strain is not lethal, but it does induce a heavy amount of vomiting (about the same amount of vomiting that accompanies the use of SAIL). No one is quite sure how this strain formed, but some scientists believe it originated in the Fens geese. It appears they spread the virus everywhere when they took over a deserted campus. 

We interviewed the measles to learn more about the situation.

“Yeah, everyone counted me out in January. People only freaked out for, like, a day, and then suddenly all people cared about was coronavirus. That’s all they talk about! So I decided to swoop in for the comeback victory and show them the measles is still a big name in the infectious disease game. I hope everyone shuts up about corona now. Aoun better put me in his book!”

The girl who contracted the measles in January is now in protective custody after a mob led by tolerant NU Facebook groups tried to scapegoat her for the most recent outbreak. 

“Look, I know I got the measles. But that was nine months ago! And it wasn’t my fault—I was vaccinated twice! Honestly, being labeled as an anti-vaxxer is way worse than having the measles was. I don’t think I’ll be able to make it out alive if NEU Gigs doxxes me.”

Students are hoping to return for the spring semester if a treatment is discovered, but word on the street is that swine flu is looking to challenge the defending disease champion as well.
articles.author: 5eae44841d76bb6ac5fe44a1
articles.attr: Measles poised to mount a late-game comeback over 'rona

articles.name: aoun-forced-to-let-quarantining-students-live-in-his-mansion
articles.title: Aoun Forced to let Quarantining Students Live in his Mansion
articles.brief: Harken back to the days of yore, when the mention of social distancing didn’t make you cringe with fear. Back to when President Aoun had his own fully-furnished, personal Boston mansion to himself. Unfortunately for our lord and savior, that is no longer the case.
articles.text:
Boston, MA – Harken back to the days of yore, when the mention of social distancing didn’t make you cringe with fear. Back to when President Aoun had his own fully-furnished, personal Boston mansion to himself. Unfortunately for our lord and savior, that is no longer the case. 

Mere hours ago, we were informed that due a Northeastern frat hosting a thousand-person rager in Matthew’s stadium yesterday, the COVID-19 quarantine rooms have exceeded maximum occupancy. 

Northeastern’s site said that while normally they would just kick these students out, they weren’t actually putting anyone at risk due to them all already being infected.

When asked for comment, Aoun explained: “We attempted to shuffle them around our Boston holdings, but the influx of soon-to-be college dropouts needing to quarantine has proven too strong even for the Midtown Hotel. Now I am left with no choice but to let these fucking peasants into my private mansion in order to keep the school running. The injustice of it all drives me insane, I mean, just because my mansion is funded with their tuition money doesn’t mean they’re worthy of living here!”

Northeastern Student Deanna Kelly has since moved into the 34th guest room, and had this to say about her experience:

“Well, I think it’s much better here than Lightview. Instead of a sweltering room with splintering floorboards and peeling paint, I’m now in a luxurious room with a golden chandelier and my own private chef, maid, and butler! I just had to quarantine because my roommate went to a ‘rona party and now we are all locked down, but I’d rather get corona myself than leave here. They can’t make me leave, right? I can’t go back… they can’t make me! Right? RIGHT!?!”

We had to excuse ourselves from the room, as Aoun’s private security force sedated her and returned her to her California king bed. However, we did catch a glimpse of Aoun himself staring at us from half a mile down the hallway. We think he’s up to something here but we can’t make out exactly what without a telescope...

articles.name: inspired-by-medieval-monarchy-neu-introduces-arranged-marriage-program-to-boost-college-rankings
articles.title: Inspired by Medieval Monarchy, NEU Introduces Arranged Marriage Program to Boost College Rankings
articles.brief: There really are only so many ways one can propel oneself up US News’ tedious little list without committing crime (not that that’s off the table), so we had to do what no BU student has done before: think differently. Combining our willingness to take bold risks at whatever cost necessary with a touch of medieval zest from the faculty book club’s summer reading of A Game of Thrones, Northeastern has created a lovechild we think you will all grow to adore: arranged marriage.
articles.text:
***this statement was transcribed verbatim from a Zoom call between a Northeastern representative and an indentured Husky Husky serf.


Good evening. 


Speaking to you today is Earnest Earnington, one of your gracious Northeastern overlords and drone masters. As part of our new transparency initiative I have chosen to address this announcement directly to you, my miserable little constituents. 


As you may know, Northeastern has accomplished the impossible by jumping over 100 college ranks in under 20 years, and we are eager to continue this trend. Especially eager after Lord Aoun informed us that those who fail to maintain the upwards climb will be sentenced to sleep in a cage with Eastbrook till the completion of the Ruggles elevator.


Nonetheless, there really are only so many ways one can propel oneself up US News’ tedious little list without committing crime (not that that’s off the table), so we had to do what no BU student has done before: think differently. Combining our willingness to take bold risks at whatever cost necessary with a touch of medieval zest from the faculty book club’s summer reading of A Game of Thrones, we’ve created a lovechild we think you will all grow to adore: arranged marriage.


I know what you’re thinking. “But Earnest! Your Zoom profile picture is Henry VIII!” Well, it’s not me you’re marrying, is it? Who you will be marrying, however, are fine ladies and gentlemen cultivated in top notch Ivy League greenhouses. That’s right, as part of this ground breaking scheme to gain status, Northeastern is giving away its finest specimens to marry alumni from the indistinguishable roth-IRA-evangelizing legacies of the god almighty Ivy Leagues.


Now, you must be wondering how we sold this lovely idea to such appraised institutions. Because let’s be honest here, it’s hard to convince such noblemen with a bright future—or any future, for that matter—to marry automated robots whose only programming is to salivate at the every move of a middle aged university president. Well, the answer is simple: money. Or a very fat dowry, if I were to put it more elegantly.


Dowry will include, but is not limited to: two harvested hearts and a liver (up to date on hepatitis B and C vaccinations) presented in gold encrusted canopic jars, a personal AI robot to read you bedtime stories from Northeastern’s Dragon Prayer book, as well as a once in a lifetime 2.13% discount at the NEU bookstore. 


Aoun will of course be giving away each of the brides at these weddings, regardless of the status of her biological father. If you were selected to be part of this program, a team of masked well-meaning dwarfs will promptly pick you up in an unmarked donkey carriage.
articles.author: 5f3c703c2796d045b71678c9
articles.attr: Aoun blesses a holy matrimony

articles.name: 5-tips-to-avoid-hypothermia-in-the-dorms
articles.title: 5 Tips to Avoid Hypothermia in the Dorms
articles.brief: Fall is officially upon us, and that means on-campus housing will be freezing cold until Facilities decides to turn the heat on in April. Here are some fun ways to keep the hypothermia at bay this semester!
articles.text:
Boston, MA – Fall is officially upon us, and that means on-campus housing will be freezing cold until Facilities decides to turn the heat on in April. Here are some fun ways to keep the hypothermia at bay this semester!

Stop Disappointing Your Parents and Man Up

It’s a little chilly in the dorms. So what? Do you think kids in Africa complain about the cold? Grow a pair and deal with it! NU doesn’t tolerate beta cucks. Being able to feel your fingers and toes is overrated anyway. 

Contract COVID-19

Nothing warms your body up like a good fever, and COVID-19 is all the rage these days. Your body’s immune system is already weakened from the cold environment, so all you need now is a source of germs. The Ryder Hall practice rooms should be a good place to start.

Snuggle Buddies

Have social-distancing regulations left you starved for physical intimacy? Snuggling up with your roommates might be the perfect way to make that ice-cold apartment hot and steamy. (Pro tip: make sure to remove all clothing for optimal transfer of body heat.) 

Dumpster Fire

Dumpster fires are a quick and cost-effective way to heat up any space. Didn’t have room to bring a dumpster fire with you to campus? Don’t worry! Just open up Microsoft Outlook. That should do the trick. 

Work Out

Hahaha just kidding. I’d rather freeze to death.

articles.brief: Welcome one, welcome all, to the first Husky Husky presidential debate live blog! In order to better inform you, our readers, of what is really going on in our candidate’s minds, we’ll be giving our totally objective views of how neither candidate is as hot as Aoun and why they couldn’t even get into NU.in.
articles.text:
Welcome one, welcome all, to the first Husky Husky presidential debate live blog!

We know that you are all especially excited for this because we know we aren’t! Honestly, we are as confused as you are as to why two people whose jobs are to get us to like them would have us sit through a 1.5hr slog of a debate.


In order to better inform you, our readers, of what is really going on in our candidate’s minds, we’ll be giving our totally objective views of how neither candidate is as hot as Aoun and why they couldn’t even get into NU.in. 

We hope you enjoy the live blog starting at 9PM EDT tonight, and encourage you all to vote come elections. Just make sure that instead of voting for the idiots that are President Trump and Vice-President Biden, you write-in Aoun. 

#Aoun2020 #KeepAmericaGreedy #MakeAmericaRobotProof #IncreaseStudentDebt #BenHescottVP


[Disclaimer: This is a political debate. The article will make some jokes about politics. These don’t necessarily represent our views and are certainly not endorsements of politicians or policies, or anything else for that matter.]

articles.name: students-begin-speedrunning-corona-testing
articles.title: Students Begin Speedrunning Corona Testing
articles.brief: The Reddit speedrunning community at Northeastern has experienced record growth recently. While some people are training in categories ranging from crossing bridges to buying Cheetos at Wollaston’s, the true athletes have begun racing for the fastest time to take a corona test.
articles.text:
Boston, MA – The Reddit speedrunning community at Northeastern has experienced record growth recently. While some people are training in categories ranging from crossing bridges to buying Cheetos at Wollaston’s, the true athletes have begun racing for the fastest time to take a corona test.

The first few runners were total noobs, going in the middle of rush-hour and ending with times upwards of 75 minutes. Fucking normies.

After a strenuous day of training, someone managed to break the 15 minute mark by showing up at the ungodly hour of 8:00 AM to get the first appointment. But since he wouldn’t shut up about it everyone’s trying to show up at 8:00 now. After that, almost a week went by with minimal changes. A few students managed to go under 14 minutes by doing the test on the run and  throwing their swab at the proctors as they raced out the door, but after that was when things really started to ramp up.

A group of true memelords realized that the biggest issue with the testing times was waiting in line before getting an identifying label. In order to overcome this, they jerry-rigged the AC units near the entrance to spread their immense B.O. and wore their gas masks in as their peers stampeded to escape. This managed to bring down times to 8 minutes.

The new strategy caused the competition to get even more intense.  As some of you might have experienced recently, there are proctors that take ages to initiate the sacred nose-swabbing ritual! Trimming down the time was crucial, so the top three speedrunners decided to get them hooked on adderall ahead of their tests to make them faster. This led to the first sub-5:00 run last Tuesday.

The most interesting speedrunner of all is Richard Vicary, the current record-holder. Richard has devised the most efficient method yet: by contracting corona, he received access to the exclusive testing center for symptomatic students, allowing him to evade the normal lines and procedure. While no speedrunner since has been able to beat this time, Richard won’t be able to take on any future challengers,  as he has been banned from campus for “snorting cough residue off of the local hospital’s ER door”.
articles.author: 5ee693b7de0849334e41224e
